name: Armageddump
description:
Can you survive the Trashpocalypse? It's time to find out. Plot Summary

Trash. Rubbish. Garbage. As far as the eye can see. Great piles of the stuff roll across the landscape. And you, in the middle of it all.

Why are you there? What's that roughly put-together training dummy doing? What's that strange laughter off in the distance, and that big, big shadow... Find out by clicking Play Game.

Each boss in this game has a unique way of being beaten, find it or you'll have a hard time with them. You're in a hurry, and need a hint on how to beat the bosses? Here you can find a whole walkthrough!
